channel.title: Error Connecting for others
channel.description: My server appears to have a problem. I just set it up, jared it, no-ip, and portfowarded and its not connecting for others. Maybe i didnt change the host name in the client to the right one but idk. If someone could help me that would be great. Pm me on here your skype so i can reslove this problem.

item.title: Error Connecting for others
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

Double-Check the server ip, make sure you jarred and signed it correctly, and make sure you close out of uTorrent when running the server.

Read full topic
